link.title: Python Programming
link.description: Computer programming is the core of the computer science and strong fundamentals of programming can give competitive edge in this technology driven world. It not only instils coding skills but also enhances problem solving ability. Python is one of the programming languages which is versatile and feature rich yet simple and easy to learn, has applications in various domains. Python programming sets the basis for further study of web development, data science, IoT, machine learning etc.
